website_summaries.verdict: This masterfully constructed mattress helps alleviate pressure while you sleep.
pros: Ventilated mattress reduces the risk that you will overheat
Equipped with CertiPUR-US-certified foam for added safety
Features dual memory foam layers that deliver immense softness
Mattress is resistant to both dust mites and allergens
cons: Mattress may be too firm for some users

customer_reviews.title: There's fiberglass in this bed 😠
customer_reviews.text: After a year of owning it, fiberglass started purging out from the sides. It makes me itchy all over, it completely contaminated all of my bedding. The glass even stuck a sliver in my girlfriends foot. There's fiberglass dust on everything in the room after using a flashlight, you can see it sparkling. It bothers me I'm stuck on the couch or breathing it in and laying in it. This is unacceptable and I demand a refund. Behold right before my eyes when I investigated, under the cover, the foam is surrounded by a fiberglass bag! Sad for a product that would have been a good value otherwise. Lucid, please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Elradiuzi

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable! Easy Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress at an unbelievably low price! Great competition for mattresses selling for over $1,000. We love it! Took about 5 hours to expand to the full 14 inches. If you're looking for a mattress, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Home

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very plush...a slight odor, but subtle. It should dissipate in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: curvygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mattress by Lucid that we have bought. We have a queen but wanted a bigger mattress so now we bought a king size. The queen we bought about 6 years ago. We did buy a 3" memory foam topper for our first mattress so we knew when we bought this one that we'd probably do the same. We love the mattress but without the additional topper it's a little too firm for us. I would still recommend this product to anyone. Our queen is still in perfect shape with little sag. We expect the same from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress great buy
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a mattress online and wasn't sure what to expect. I must say though this Lucid mattress is amazing. I wish I could give it another star. It came all I had to do is cut the plastic very carefully with the cutter they provided. I let it sit on the bed while we went out of town. It has a little smell to it but once we got back the smell was gone. The mattress had inflated perfectly. It's not very soft but soft enough that it give you support. Best sleep I gotten in a while
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Posie

customer_reviews.title: Great firmness and wonderful rest! Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress!! We both find it to be plenty firm yet still contours to our individual bodies. I use to slip with pillows under my knees to reduce the stress on my lower back while sleeping. Since we put this mattress down - the pillows are gone. We did need to let the bed open for the full 2-days to fully expand - probably because it was the 14-inch model. The mattress did have an odor that lasted nearly a week - but it has long since dissipated. I use to wake up at least twice a night - now I might wake up once a week in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Robin10282

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfey
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed, very surprised at how much we love it. It says plush so we totally expected to sink into it, but you do not. It’s actually pretty stable/medium firm. Hard to get out of box and get in place by yourself but if your a determined female like Myself you can do it. Recommend 2 people put the bed in place. We did wait 48 hours to sleep on it. That’s the hardest part, I’d go in 5 times a day with the tape measure to see if it was ready. Worth every penny we paid. Would definitely buy again, my 2 nephews and a friend also bought this mattress and also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Nuskievicz

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep you will ever get!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing!! I have no hip or back pain anymore!!! I will be replacing all mattresses in my house with these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: What a buy! Have been sleeping on it for two weeks. Best sleep in years. The mattress keeps you firmly in same position. It is not too soft and not too hard. Comes in a box shrink wrapped. Cut the bag and away it goes. Takes about 24 hours for it to be large enough to sleep on. The fumes were strong. We had to leave windows open in room. Then the fumes linger under the covers for a few more nights. Compared this to the Sealy TEN INCH we bought for a grand, this is equal in every way.
customer_reviews.author: QUIZ KID

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went from a $4800 queen Tempurpedic HD to the $650 14 inch Lucid in a king and, while I had my doubts, I absolutely love this mattress. It is more comfortable than the Tempurpedic at 1/8 the price. And I swear that no one paid me or gave me a discount or anything else like that to say this. It just really is that good.
customer_reviews.author: Smarth Blargsen

customer_reviews.title: if that makes sense lol So far I love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: So far a 5 star! I was a little nervous because other reviewers kept saying it was firm and this is (at least for me) the area for the PLUSH memory foam mattress. This IS plush. Its strong not firm when you sit down you really sink in but when you lay down its much softer of a sink in, if that makes sense lol So far I love this mattress. Very comfortable very conforming to the body just what I needed! Im actually sleeping through the night now :) Yes, as of yet I recommend this mattress. Also, it does expand to a full 14". Good luck, God bless!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product and super value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Lucid mattresses for my kids and they seemed pretty comfortable. My Tempur-Pedic was at the end of its life cycle and I was shopping around. I wanted to stick with a memory foam type mattress. I compared this mattress to some f the popular brands out there, Tempur-Pedic. Purple, Nectar, Casper, Avacado, Loom & Leaf, Saatva, When compared, Lucid is right up there for the materials of construction and warranty but they are not up there in price, the value of the cost here is outstanding. I've been sleeping on this for 2+ months and I am not disappointed with the decision to buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is the worst one I’ve ever owned. I’ve had it for almost a year and a half and it’s sunk in where we’ve slept. On both sides, I might add...I have turned it, flipped it, everything to try to prevent this yet it still happened. Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s better then tacos.
customer_reviews.text: So I took a gamble buying this online but the previous reviews sold me. Who doesn’t love a bed that’s as good as tacos?! This mattress is a dream & the cost is crazy good for what you get. Literally have not tossed or turned since sleeping on this piece of heaven. You lay down and it’s the next day! Def recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: After about 6 months the sleeping areas stared to break down.
customer_reviews.text: I was nice to replace our old mattress, First, be willing to wait, It took almost 2 months for it to get here, Second, the area we sleep in stated sinking and getting harder. Now when we get in bed we roll into the indentions. Which if you go to their site you will find out that it is not covered under the 25-year warranty. We had tried to get a good picture to support a claim but it didn't matter. Third, the bamboo and the cooling gel did nothing our old memory foam mattress did without those items. I did a lot of research, (all most 6 months) and still got a piece of trash!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is awesome! Shipped super fast and delivered by Amazon. It expanded to it’s full size in less than an hour. Super comfortable. Supportive, but pretty plush at the same time. I’m fully aware from some of the reviews that there are duds, but as long as you get one that’s not defective they’re AWESOME! I’ll be getting twin sized ones and another queen one soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect combination of soft yet supportive! I don’t wake up in pain anymore!!! I can sleep through the night with just one normal wake up that has nothing to do with the bed instead of 30 times! I will say it did take a few days to a week to adjust to it. I was use to the moving and shaking of a box spring mattress, but now I’ll never go back. Well made and a great price! I also bought the amazon basics foldable metal platform as the base and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleep.. not for pelvic activity
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great for sleep and for that, I had to rate it a 4 but the big detractor is the lack of support for any kind of pelvic activity. The very properties that lend it superb sleeping comfort make for a Quicksand Experience: throws off the rhythm, angles are not conducive. At this point in our lives THIS is much more important than sleep! READ THE FINE PRINT! The one month “trial” starts the minute you hit the BUY NOW button. We WILL be buying a firm, conventional mattress and gifting this one to some people in the Twilight of their Lives!
customer_reviews.author: aprilrrain

customer_reviews.title: Dopest dope I've ever smoked.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bed. I bought the 14" I believe and couldn't be happier except one issue if you can call it that. It's honestly almost too big! 14 inches sound awesome but when placed on a low laying ikea bed, it looks like the two don't fit.. this is not in anyway the manufactures fault, just a suggestion for others with a low level bed that uses those slates, or pieces of wood instead of a boxspring. As for the quality... it's great, and I can't even tell there's no boxspring(another reason you could go smaller). I would say it's a pretty firm mattress but that's something I wanted. Tldr: would buy again but smaller:)
customer_reviews.author: Willaz

customer_reviews.title: Could be firmer, but I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.text: When I read the reviews for this, people often describe this mattress as firm. I feel like I’m sleeping in a cloud, but I sink in a little too much. I could have definitely gone with a firmer mattress. I would definitely describe this as plush. I have slept so much better on this than my old box spring mattress. For the price, I am happy with my upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rose Foyt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mattress.. just not really for me.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seems to be a very comfortable mattress but definitely more on the plush side. Good for those without any back/neck issues. Only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because I do like the height of the mattress, my Husband LOVES the plush feel (he has no back/neck issues), and I haven't had it long enough yet to determine how well it holds up over time. Also, I think I'll be adding a medium firm/firm topper for a little more support for my back as well. I honestly would return to buy the 10" medium (firm) but as I said, I like the height of the 14", and simply don't want to go through the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: FeFe

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use I can safely say I'm pleased with this bed. I'm a 275 lb muscular, husky guy with disc problems, and I love this bed. I sightly sink into it and get support in all the right places. It's more firm that plush, but very comfortable. Gives perfect support. After 3 months mattress doesn't dip or pit. So far, very happy with this Lucid mattress. Thumbs up on the 10 year warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8ful

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Some of these reviews are scary. I did as much research as I could as to the problems they may be having. Apparently all memory foam beds have fiberglass in them to prevent them from catching on fire. It says on this bed to not remove the cover. So you should purchase a mattress protector so you don’t mess up the mattress. I’ve only had the need for about a week. I bought the full size for my boys. Well last night I accidentally fell asleep on it and omg, the best sleep I’ve had in a long time! I’m really thinking about replacing mine now. This bed feels so good!!! And it’s a very tall mattress. You
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Three years and counting
customer_reviews.text: Three years ago we replaced all our mattresses with these and could not be happier. We recently went on a trip where we slept on a brand new conventional mattress? Oh boy did we miss our Lucid King. We found ourselves rolling towards the middle. We could not wait to get home. Our home now consists of 3 queen and 1 king Lucid Mattress. We paid $500 for our queens and $700 for the king - well worth it. They come with a 25 year warranty. Make sure to buy a protectant cover to prevent voiding your warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed1

customer_reviews.title: Best Memory Foam Mold resistent
customer_reviews.text: It did take the 48 hrs suggested or a bit longer until I was not sensitive to the smell. Every night my sleep gets better and better on this solid, soft, luxurious memory foam mattress. It keeps cool and I love the added charcoal layer! A steal at Amazon's special rate!
customer_reviews.author: C J K

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress - sizes are misleading
customer_reviews.text: First, this mattress feels great. The quality seems to be on par with mattresses of equal or greater price. The problem is with the advertised 14" size. Our bed only expanded to 12 inches, and judging by other reviews we're certainly not alone. Normally, I wouldn't care, but we spent an extra $50 for the 14" mattress. I'll reach out to Lucid, but I don't expect any help on their end. My advice - get the mattress, but save some money and just opt for the 12", as that's what you're likely to get anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The idea was great but item fell short
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was more firm than I thought it would be. I haven’t had this mattress 6 months and it’s ruined. It’s starting to sink in spots. It’s hard to get in and out of at times. The sides were great but now they sink as well. I’m highly disappointed because this mattress was not cheap. I’ve never had a mattress that I couldn’t keep at least 2 years. I wish I could give a positive review but I can’t. I should have actually sent it back when it only rose to 12 inches instead of 14. Maybe it was flawed. I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: squarepeg_photography

customer_reviews.title: Ultra comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've had far more expensive mattresses, but none as comfortable. This one meets every claim the description makes, or exceeds them. Buy this mattress! Your body will love you every morning you wake up on it.
customer_reviews.author: AlienMindTrick

customer_reviews.title: Reconditioned and refurbished not new
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress 3 years ago for another home and it was perfectly conditioned, brand new mattress. The cover was the original one. This time we received a refurbished/reconditioned mattress with a different cover. The box was in a very bad shape with tape everywhere. In addition, we recall very well the odor of the new mattress took over 3 weeks to fade, this time no odor at all. It is very disappointing to pay for a new mattress and receive a refurbished one. We were in the midst of moving and needed it. Won't buy again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Not a Plush Bed!
customer_reviews.text: They seriously need to market this bed as FIRM! As the description suggested, I thought it would be plush...WRONG! Now I need to buy a soft pillow topper.
customer_reviews.author: Not Your Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this mattress for over 3 years. A Christmas gift to ourselves. It’s the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on. My husband sleeps hot and I’ve slept on temperpedic before and this is much cooler. It has a form fitting give but not soft or bouncy. I’m lazy and have never flipped it and we have no indentations or soft spots. I recommend. I do recall a slight smell for a couple days after unfolding and it went away as others described as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a lot of mattresses and of this mattress is by far the best I have ever had it is an amazing quality and a perfect price don't waste your time going to the mattress store and spending thousands of dollars because this mattress is worth thousands of dollars but is priced way better
customer_reviews.author: cel

customer_reviews.title: Many years in, it’s just an OK mattress. Nothing great.
customer_reviews.text: With this being memory foam, it obviously gets hot during the night. I’ve slept on popular name-brand memory foam mattresses and they definitely feel more supportive than this. My LUCID mattress makes you feel like you’re sleeping in a hole. For side sleepers, rather than absorbing pressure points like the shoulders or hips, your body just sinks in from the middle, like a hammock. The same goes for back sleepers. The price is right for someone who doesn’t care about good support, but I have developed lower back issues from this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! So much better than spring beds!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched mattresses for hours and i was skeptical about buying online and not being able to sit on it first..however this bed is PERFECT..more on the firm side but im a side sleeper and its perfect for me..im 6'2 250 and this 14 inch mattress is plenty big for my big a**!! If your contemplating an online purchase of a mattress as i was, this 14 inch Lucid is perfect..quick shipping (2 days) and came vaccuum sealed..took maybe 15 min to expand and had no smell as other reviewers complained that some brands had a nauseating smell but not this one!! Buy you wont be disappointed😁
customer_reviews.author: Jon bahrey

customer_reviews.title: You will love this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know where to start. This is a real review and I’ll sum it up. You will love this mattress. I suffered for years from back pain. 85% of it is gone. I have pain through the day after I tire. However when I wake I’m pain free. It’s so comfortable, soft and smooth. You will need deep pocket sheets. Dont be cheap buy nice sheets/linen to continue your comfort. You will also need to allow it to sit uncovered for several hours . This will ensure maximum height and diameter. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Graham

customer_reviews.title: Supportive  and quality
customer_reviews.text: **update* One and a half week in and the mattress is sagging on the sides where we sleep! What a total disappointment So far we are happy with the quality of this mattress. It is quite a bit more firm than I expected, we ordered the medium plush. It is comfortable though and supportive. We will see how long it lasts but even if I only get a solid year out of it, that’s a better than my last coil mattress that we only got to use for a year before it wore out and it was way more expensive. It would be five stars if it were a little more plush
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Hard, hard, HARD
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to get this new mattress. Unfortunately it is a huge let down! I selected the medium firm thinking that it would be slightly soft but mostly hard....this bed is like sleeping on a blanket on top of a sheet of plywood. Very uncomfortable. My wife loves a firm mattress and she doesn’t like it either. The corners underneath the bed never fully “inflated” either. We tried everything but the won’t drop down. All this being said, we returned it back to amazon for a full refund and are now searching for a new mattress while we try to cope with sleeping on this rock for the time being!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not for large/heavy people.
customer_reviews.text: After Less than just one month, I’m having to rotate the mattress. It’s already compressing a dip in it. I’m an athletic 6ft 225lbs, and this mattress just can’t take it. First few days were nice. But then a noticeable dip set in where I was sleeping. I really wanted to like this mattress, but it’s far too soft and gives way. I’d grade it a C- to a D, on a grading scale.
customer_reviews.author: CaliConsumer

customer_reviews.title: LUV IT
customer_reviews.text: Truly 14 inches deep. First foam mattress and it's great. My back loves it so much better that my plush spring mattress. Zipper opening allows access to internal layers for cleaning or adding and replacing layers. Keep cool. Plush.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY BED!!! We lay down and immediately fall to sleep, and wake with no aches and pains. The cover is removable, but zips/unzips under the mattress (which is heavy), and can be washed. We have found the cover is waterproof!! A HUGE plus!! We have the 14" but honestly could have done fine with a 10".
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Lansman

customer_reviews.title: Super great mattress
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a pillowtop mattress that was about 7 years old with this. My husband was skeptical at first and didn't like it conforming to his body but now after having this since Thanksgiving 2019 he has only good things to say! His job is laborious and the mattress eases his joint pain. I can't say much for sleep quality because i have sleep issues and he still snores but it doesn't make us like the mattress less. It's so soft and the king size works out great. We don't get overly hot but it hasn't been summer yet. Overall if you're considering ordering a mattress online, this one is definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I've Had this bed for 6 months now, and it's amazing. Super comfortable, and great all around. It conforms to my body and springs back when I get out of bed. When I'm sick, rather than move to the couch, I want to stay in bed! Plus, the matress cover envelops the mattress rather than sitting on top. If you are when thinking about getting this, I suggest you do it!
customer_reviews.author: Anony-mouse

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent mattress, firm mattress with soft touch is great ...
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent mattress, firm mattress with soft touch is great for sleep. It is just couple of weeks that I bought this. It says to reverse the mattress every week which is hard to do as it is very heavy and there is no support on side for gripping, so moving is very difficult especially the King size mattress, that is why I am giving 4 starts instead of 5. Will see how this feels after 6 months or 1 year
customer_reviews.author: Pranav Kumar

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over a year, VERY thick (14 inches), very comfortable and a great price. Twin mattress holds up well - I'm 5'1 and 115 pounds, I haven't had any problems. It has a foam base that zips to the memory foam mattress topper, which is about 3-4 inches.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Plush, no pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an old, lumpy mattress and thought- memory foam is good for side sleepers. Boyyyyy was I wrong. This says it's a plush mattress, but it is not plush at all. I wake up and roll around even more on this mattress than the old mattress and am sore LITERALLY EVERYWHERE. I don't think I've ever slept on a more uncomfortable mattress in my life. Cons: Not plush (at all) Not cooling Not comfortable Pros: ? Cost? I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Annie~

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure how to rate this bed. When I read "Plush," I was like heck yeah! I love soft. I hesitated for sure, though. I found an external reviewing of this bed, and it was said to be "cloud like." Now granted, I only just got this bed..... But this bed is definitely not "cloud like." It feels... Dense. That's not to say it isn't a great bed, it got me to sleep fast! However, I definitely know I'm on a bed. My old pillow top innerspring was softer. We shall see how it is after a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: A-moon-amous

customer_reviews.title: Not a good start, but getting better!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll rate the mattress incrementally as time passes. Delivery: The best thing I can say, so far, is that it arrived on time. It was plastic wrapped, not in a box.. The plastic was ripped and parts of the mattress were exposed and dirty. The mattress was partially expanded and uneven. Previous memory foam purchases were fully compresses and boxed. This made them much easier to handle. Setup: no problem setting it up. Mattress expanded to full size quickly and uniformly. 1st Night sleep: The mattress was very comfortable. Better than expected, perfect for a side sleeper. 30 day review: TBD
customer_reviews.author: Louis Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not plush enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not plush enough. I'm a side sleeper and it wasnt nearly soft enough for me. Felt like a firm mattress. I'm currently attempting to send it back, and boxing it up is nearly impossible. I've purchased a bag to put it in, sucked all the air out with a vacuum and used 3 ratchet straps to get it into the box and it still doesnt fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey M.

customer_reviews.title: No more body aches + great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I bought this mattress. It exceeded my expectations. I no longer wake up with the body aches I always thought were just part of aging. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rinnert

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a mattress online and so far I am pleased. We were super bummed when our more expensive mattress started to break down before warranty (yet the depression was not enough to make a claim: you know how it is). For myself it was hardest as a stomach sleeper as I started waking up in pain. So after reading reviews we bought this mattress online and so far I am so pleased. It provided me the support I need to sleep on my stomach while still being relatively soft. The price was right too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & Adam

customer_reviews.title: Had to learn how to sleep on memory foam. A bit firmer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: We are still learning how to sleep on a memory foam bed. It took awhile for us to learn not to plop into bed or how to roll over gently. When you plop or roll you have to think about it or you feel like you’re hitting a wall. But after you move the mattress does conform to your shape. We have slept on it a little over a month and it’s get more and more comfortable. I do wish it was softer. It’s firmer than described or than we were expecting. Hoping that over time it will get softer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wont recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have slept on it awhile, and have decided this is ok for side sleepers but if either of us sleep on our back that night, we have major back pain. Mine is so much so i dont want to move much. I wouldnt recommend this mattress, from the perspective of a mom of 4 kids and active duty army. We arent out of shape, we are very active and fit, but this just isnt very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has given me the best sleep of my life. If you are a side sleeper, the plush feel is perfect while providing needed support. Sleeps cool. It is absolutely wonderful!!!! Love!
customer_reviews.author: SunnyRN

customer_reviews.title: Sleep.. where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: Folks, I was very unsure at first but after my son and his wife got one we tried it ourselves. This is the best purchase we have made on Amazon yet! My husband workout regularly and is a big man, our old bed I would feel every twist, turn, up and down he would make. With this Lucid bed, I feel nothing. My body has felt better and well rested just even after the first nights rest. I can't say enough about how pleased we are with this mattress. We even bought the 2pk kin size pillows, for the perfect nightly sleep! Lucid, where have you been all my life!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time, studied and compared, read 4000 reviews... I finally pulled the trigger on this one. I got the 14 inch, SO glad I did!! No odor at all, fully inflated after about 4 hours or so. I put it on my existing box spring, and it's perfect for me. Definitely plush, but also really good support. I sleep on my side mostly, and it did take a few nights to get used to, but I love it. I've had it for about a month so far, would totally do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F

customer_reviews.title: Is 'Life-Changing' too over-the-top?
customer_reviews.text: My son and his wife have gone through several mattresses over the last few years. The sides always break down or a 'trough' develops in the middle making every night a meeting of the minds...and elbows, ribs and noses - NOT comfortable. I got this for them for Christmas (it arrived a bit early). Since then, they sleep better than they have in a long time. The top is soft enough to feel wonderful, but firm enough to offer all the support they need. Best Christmas present I've ever given them! Now, instead of elbows in kidneys, it's all cuddles and zzzz's. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it ..
customer_reviews.text: The mattress I had prior to this cost almost 6 X more it was made by a big name "Sealy" which was half the mattress this is. I read reviews that were negative stating it didn't rise to the full height,had sagging corners,dirty, mine had none if these issues.matter of fact mine was completely perfect.and this is a little early but after a week of sleeping it bounces back perfect and I sleep great. I'll let you know how I feel after a few months but as of now it's a decision I very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I got the king size in ultra plush and my back pain is gone. I sleep better than I ever had. It sucks that its white, but I put a waterproof bed bug protector on mine mainly to keep it from getting stained (My dogs sleep with me). I was really apprehensive about buying a mattress I've never felt but I love it. It feels like laying on a temperpedic (I'm sure I misspelled that). But it's like 1/10 the cost. I have had it for 3 months and haven't had a problem with sinking or sagging. If I do I'll up date this.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Showen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible (bought in Feb '13) Husband is an engineer too (so what)
customer_reviews.text: It smelled terrible; had to vent it for more than a month. It only took about 1 year before it started having annoying soft spots, so we flipped it and we slept on the harder side, that also started started having annoying soft spots in about another year. Just not worth the money. For 2-3 times this amount we bought a new high quality mattress at a mattress store. This LUCID purchase was expensive in terms of money and lack of comfort!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cha

customer_reviews.title: Had mine for 3 yrs. Now.
customer_reviews.text: Do not regret this purchase. Still love it. Has not had any slumping and I weigh 200+. Would buy again and again but don't think I will have to if this one keeps lasting.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress, but their mattress protector makes me sweat every night
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I love how it conforms to my body when I lay on it. So much more comfortable, & easier and gentler on my back compared to my old Vera Wang pillowtop spring mattress. Proving that price doesn’t always mean better. I only wish I ordered a different brand bed protector instead of Lucid’s. It’s and excellent protector only it makes me sweat at night. Not great waking every morning in wet/damp clothes. I suggest you buy a different brand mattress protector that doesn’t cause sweating over night, but definitely get the mattress. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Raegan Ferro

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep = better person.
customer_reviews.text: There’s not very much edge-support (5 stars if it did), but that’s fine for solo sleepers and couples who still like each other. Ive had this for two nights so far. I’m a side sleeper, and I usually toss a few times in the first 15-30 minutes I enter bed. But I noticed that I was comfy where I got in, and I didn’t turn based on the pressure and resistance I felt with my previous mattress. I was just content where I was. When I wake up, it’s in the same position that I originally laid down.
customer_reviews.author: Zizi

customer_reviews.title: this one has proven perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy pillowtop mattresses because I prefer a softer mattress. But, this one has proven perfect for me. It is more firm than a pillow top but it gives to your body, yet bounces back and I love it. I’ve slept on it for 8 months and I’d gladly purchase another one. Also, the foam is not hot to sleep on. There is an initial smell that goes away quickly and after waiting the recommended time to sleep on it, it was not overpowering at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I have been sleeping like a baby since the purchase of this mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was recommended to me by a friend. I'm happy I listened to her because I'm extremely happy. I love a plush mattress and the Lucid medium plush makes me feel supported and wrapped in softness. This was the first mattress I ordered out of a box and online. I let the mattress expand for the stated amount of time on the box. It's an interesting process to watch. I didn't experience any weird smells but I did experience a small gap in between the mattress and my bed frame on both sides. After putting sheets and comforters it went unnoticed and after nearly two months of use It doesn't look like the gap exist anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you. This bed was super easy to set up. You will need a STRONG person to help you if it is going up any steps. I read reviews about a smell. My bed had NO smell what so ever. It is super comfortable and just the right amount of support. The Amazon delivery guys were GREAT as well. Thank you Amazon!!! Product is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Much to firm.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking mattress, has a small dirt stain about the size of a dollar bill on the mattress cover. Was firmly wrapped in plastic, box was missing. Very uncomfortable, like sleeping on the floor. Just bought a 2 inch topper so hopefully that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Bkrdr50

customer_reviews.title: Bed is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought a temperpedic mattress when I was living in Ocala. It was a King size and way to big to move up here where I moved a year and a half ago. Paying at lest four times as much for it this mattress is incredible. It is probably better then the temp. one. It didn't take long at all to get to 14 inches and the smell was gone within a day. You can smell it a little bit but that is if you put your nose up against the mattress.Don't hesitate on buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Boone

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mattress i ever owned. I wake up everyday with headaches, and body aches. The mattress doesn’t align your body the way it should for it to get up and feel well rested. I’ve tried different pillows, different sleeping positions. And then i tried the floor and let me tell it felt better than this mattress. I gave it too many days to take a chance and now I’m stuck with it because i can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Zarate

customer_reviews.title: No Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: I am most impressed that there were no odors. Within a few hours it was 12 inches. One week later and it has not reached 14 inches, seems to be stuck at 12 inches. I'll update when I've had it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: 5 years of great sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought the queen size 6 years ago after my sleep number just wasn’t cutting it. Loved it over the first 5 or so years. I’ve rotated it for the first five years and then started flipping it. Seems the memory foam has to good of a memory lately. Waking up after a couple hours to move to a different spot because I feel like I’m sinking. Was hoping that it would last longer. Guess I’ll try a mattress topper for now. Update: Topper did not help. Mattress sags to much. Guess the mattress’s memory is just to far gone. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Buying a mattress from a store is insanely expensive. So I went to a mattress store to lay on some and get some ideas. Tempurpedic brand is outrageous. So I picked the Lucid 14' plush memory foam. It arrived so fast! I made sure it was on the right side when I put it on my bed. NO smell at all and within 2 hours of opening it, I took a nap on it!!! WOW. WOW! Is all I can say. I only have 1 issue and that is now I have to buy steps so my dog can get back on it and that is IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Plush??? Not so much!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress because after much research online, it appeared that this mattress would be provide a soft comfortable night's sleep. I followed the instructions included with the mattress, letting it expand for a minimum of 48 hours. A positive note...it has very little off gassing. However, in terms of comfort...I would say that it has a medium feel. It's definitely NOT SOFT OR PLUSH. If you're looking for medium, this will probably be a good solution, but if you're looking for a soft mattress, this is not it. I gave it t 2 stars because I believe that it's a quality mattress, but doesn't provide the comfort level that it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: dws11

customer_reviews.title: Never knew a memory foam mattress could be this comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had used a 3" memory foam topper for years, but felt it was time for a new mattress. We decided to go for a total foam mattress and not just a topper. We can't wait to go to bed at night any more. It is firm but you can feel it conform to your body curves for support. I have a full size bed because it is an antique, so when my husband would move, I would normally feel it. Not with this mattress. I never feel him get out of bed at night any more. If you are hesitating to purchase a memory foam mattress, don't! This one is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: D. Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. When I first received i put on bed and did not rise to the size it said it would so I lift up the end of mattress and kept plopping it up and down then did the other side and it all came up to the size. I have slept on it for quit awhile and I dont have as much hip pain as I did with my other mattress. Will not ever go back to a regular mattress again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Wait the 48hr period, then the 3rd night of sleeping on it (day #5/6) it will be a dream!!
customer_reviews.text: First 3 nights (after waiting the 48hr period) were rough. 4th night the bed softened up to what it is supposed to be like & OH MY GOD!! Could not ask for a better bed now. I splurged & got an adjustable bedframe & that was the best decision I've made in forever! Anyone wondering if the 14" mattress is too thick for the mechanical bedframe?? The answer is No! It moves & bends perfectly to the frame. There are no 'gaps' in the creases when the bed is in this position --> "\__/" Very Happy with the bed & will buy more in time for my 3 guest rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but stays depressed while laying
customer_reviews.text: Nice topper but compared to others we have had it is too soft. My daughter (5'8, 115lbs) sinks in and stays down until she gets out of the bed. He other topper does not behave like this. Took about 24 hours to fully puff up after unpacking. She loves being buried down in the foam but for me its a little much. Would prefer a bit more density.
customer_reviews.author: Gipper1120

customer_reviews.title: WOW !
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing ! Great bang for the buck ! Amazing right out of the box . I’m amazed how this expands to become a mattress . Once fully expanded the mattress itself is a lot easier to maneuver than a regular spring type mattress. I removed my box spring and replaced with 3/4” plywood. My 14” LUCID fits perfectly on my bed frame at the right height. So comfortable and I noticed I wake up with little to no back pain . Love it !
customer_reviews.author: DAVID F

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels bad
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this bed and am sadly disappointed. I ordered the bamboo medium plush option, but it feels extremely firm. I honestly question if they actually sent me a firm mattress by mistake, but there are no markings or tags on it that specify that. The quality of the mattress seems good in terms of cover and it did arrive in a nice box, but it’s just so hard. I wake up with a neck and backache regularly, which sucks. I wanted to like this mattress so much, but I just don’t.
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: Not 14" Not Plush Not Packaged Well
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a 14" mattress, which is not true, it's closer to 12". It's advertised as Plush which is also not true, at best this is a Medium to Firm mattress. And the packaging arrived torn, bent, and barely holding together. Otherwise it's a decent mattress, but the disingenuous advertising is rather fraudulent in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is firmer then I expected, but it is still comfortable and I no longer wake up all sore like I was. I like very plush mattresses, so I am very surprised I sleep so comfortable on this. The mattress I received was defective. It never inflated in the center, which made it impossible to sleep on. This was the only reason it got 4 stars instead of 5. However, I contacted customer service and they sent a new one out right away. The new one is great and inflating properly. I would purchase again through this company.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable, can’t beat the price and convenience. My wife loves it. I still prefer a stiff coil spring bed with a pillow top, but for the price difference there’s no way I could disagree with the wife on this one. Had it for 2.5 years now. Update: apparently 3 years is the max you’ll get out of this thing. This memory foam remembers a little too well now. Sunken in the middle, not comfortable at all anymore. Wife hates it now too.
customer_reviews.author: Alpaca Farmer

customer_reviews.title: King size dream bed!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. I was very sceptical of a boxed mattress. This, however, is an incredible bed. Very firm and provides a great night sleep. It regularly holds my husband and I plus our 75# dog which equals out to about 600# of weight. We highly recommend it. Comes rolled up in a box which my husband was able to lug up the stairs and roll out. (Its heavy, bring a strong man or a friend!)
customer_reviews.author: KatieKate

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress in the world!
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I've ever slept on. I've owned two of these the original temperpedic and a Sealy. This one fully inflated in less than 48 hours and is a luxurious feel. My back pain in less than two days has been cut in half. I'm a side sleeper and 160#. My hips dont hurt anymore. I just cant say enough about the full size 14in soft mattress!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I sleep very fitfully on the mattress but I find myself 'sunk in'. I am over 180 lbs and considerable effort is required to roll over after I've been in one spot for a while (the effort wakes me, although not for long). I also noticed a smell similar to dried hay initially but a friend suggested I hadn't waited long enough for it to air out. I will provide an update as time goes on - initial impressions are not always valid after prolonged/repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: YankeePride

customer_reviews.title: EXTREME value compared to big name mattresses
customer_reviews.text: We've been sleepin gon this mattress for several months now, and I still absolutely love it. It was easy enough for myself (I'm a large guy) to drag into the house and unpackage by myself, despite being the king size. Set up was very quick and it expanded in about 12 hours with no lingering odor. It felt nearly identical to the $4000-$5000 mattresses we layed on at the store the weeks before. Very satisfied that we got a nearly identical mattress for several thousand dollars less. We purchased a cheaper, small mattress from Lucid for our 4 year old daughter as well since we loved this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Very hard for someone with fibromyalgia. The mattress is very well built but it's way too firm. It's supposed to be medium plush but there's no plush to it. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rexann Nowak

customer_reviews.title: Did not expand
customer_reviews.text: The mattress did not evenly expand after 72+ hours and I regret ordering it. It's hard, heavy and difficult to handle. I tried to put the included mattress cover (an enclosed mattress cover) on and could not get it accomplished. This was an expensive mistake. Update 9/2/2020 I worked with customer service and they determined that the mattress I received was defective. I have received a new mattress which is MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress in February 2017, and I wanted to sleep on it a while before writing a review. Absolutely the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. I have arthritis in my hips and spine, my husband has had multiple back surgeries...I couldn't ask for a better support system for us. I am very picky when it comes to mattresses, and have been known to drag mattresses out to the horse pasture and burn them when they just don't make the cut. I will definitely buy this one again. As a matter of fact, we bought the Lucid short queen for our RV. Highly recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Donna P. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Well it's been 30 days and all I can say is WOW. This mattress reminds me of sleeping on a cotton mattress. It seems firm when you first lay down on it, but then you just kind of sink down in it. My wife had not slept a full night in a long time (hips hurting) , but now she sleeps all night. I don't sleep as long as I used to, but I feel more rested and dream a lot more. It does take getting use to though. It arrived on time, easy to assemble, and no smell what so ever. I'll rereview it in another 30 days. As always Amazon is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is exactly what I'd expected when I first purchased it. I prefer to use king-size flat sheets, rather than fitted sheets to cover it. Have and will continue to purchase from Lucid.
customer_reviews.author: JhoulGhoul

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to get in my bed at night. The comfort level is beyond my expectations. Height makes it easy to sit on the side of the bed. Adjustable feature is great. Price was well worth it. Saved lots of $$$. Bought another for my husband he didn’t snore or move last night. Delivered in two days. Winning in the sleep game. And he’s had several back surgeries with fixation!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Callis

customer_reviews.title: Medium plush= extra firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is not medium plush.. It's extra firm.. Appears to be of high quality but if your looking for a medium or plush firmness don't buy this one. There is no give or sink in to the bed at all.. It's 14 inches of solid hard foam.. If you like firm, This is the bed for you. Not sure why it's touted as medium plush.. Like I said High quality mattress for great price, just not my feel. I'd buy the brand, just not this firmness
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping in clouds
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for our bunk beds. 2 Twin XL and 2 Queen. The whole family spent the first night in our new home in the bunk room. Everyone went on and on about how comfortable the mattresses were.
customer_reviews.author: just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: 6 month review - no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mattress after 6 months. I was hesitant to purchase a mattress.on line without trying it first. My partner likes a firm mattress. I prefer plush. This was a perfect compromise. There are no more sore Spots like I used to feel after sleeping on my spring mattress. we Took this out of the box - there was no odor -it took less than 6 hours before it was to the 14 inches - we slept on it that evening. We kept our original frame - we purchased a metal support platform that went on top of that to support this. So getting used to the few inches of lower height was the only adjustment needed.
customer_reviews.author: chance

customer_reviews.title: Check the size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in a king size. We also bought a new bedroom set. We put the mattress on the bed and noticed the bed was really long. Didn't think much about it until I bought a new mattress cover and it was big. Then I realized all the sheets were really big on the bed also. I measured the mattress and the length is about 5 inches short and the width is about 3 inches short. There is a huge gap at the end of my bed between the foot board and the mattress. Curious if anyone else had this problem. We love the mattress, it's comfortable and seems well made other than the size is off.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Every night, I love getting into bed with this new mattress. It does sleep hot, so I'm using a couple of old comforters to be a bit of heat buffer. I have tried several mattress pads with no luck. But the comfort! Oh my. This mattress is so comfortable that I'm willing to do what I need to about the heat. I love it. I can sleep on my back without my lower back hurting, and my hips never get sore sleeping on my sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Webb

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this mattress now for over a month. It is by far the most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on. I never thought a few hunks of foam would make for a good mattress, but they do. Highly recommended!! Dec8, 2017: Still very, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Almost three years old
customer_reviews.text: This product is only almost three years old and it's already quite dipped in where my boyfriend sleeps. It's gotten so uncomfortable for me that I've forced him to sleep on my side to dip it in as well, and now that boy sides are dipped in, the middle is as firm as ever, leaving this very uncomfortable. When we first got it, it was great. However, this started happening within two and a half years. I feel like it was a good value still, but we are likely to look elsewhere for a mattress when we need to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best value in the mattress market!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd lucid mattress. Affordable luxurious comfort. I also own a top of the line tempurpedic and I would say the lucid is very close in comfort. I’ve tried a couple other value brands and they’re no where close to lucid.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great bed at an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money on Tempurpedic. I was skeptical about this mattress, but there were quite a few good reviews so I bought one. It is a really comfortable mattress at a great price. It only took about 8 hours to expand to where I could sleep on it and it only had a funky smell for a day or two. Since then, I have had months of great sleep with no hot spots, no sweating (while sleeping anyway), and no breakdown or sag. I bought two more - my kids liked the mattress a lot too!
customer_reviews.author: Mk2

product_meta.title: LUCID 14 Inch Memory Foam Bed Mattress Conventional, King, Medium
product_meta.description:
Size:King| Style Name:2019 Model Medium-Plush MattressThe Feel
This plush mattress is all about plush comfort. At the surface, a 1 inch layer of bamboo charcoal infused memory foam is quilted into the cover. Bamboo charcoal is especially good for sensitive skin and has improved thermal regulation. Beneath the top layer is a 3 inch layer of ventilated, gel infused memory foam. This layer helps improve breathability and temperature for a more comfortable sleep climate. Beneath the comfort layers, this mattress has a 10 inch high density foam base for excellent support.

The top memory foam layers contour to your natural curves during the night and add plushness to the surface. The memory foam also helps to isolate motion transfer between sleeping partners.

All LUCID memory foam is created using open cell technology. This prevents lasting body impressions and creates a more durable foam.

Soft, Breathable Cover 
Made of a cozy TENCEL blend fabric (10 percent TENCEL lyocell, 90 percent polyester), the soft cover creates a breathable air layer at the top of the mattress. 

Conveniently Shipped for Easy Set Up
After your new mattress arrives, simply take the package into the right room, remove it from the box and protective wrap, and watch as it expands.
feature_bullets: Dual memory foam layers on top of a supportive base create a medium-plush feel.
1-inch bamboo charcoal memory foam layer is quilted into a soft Tencel blend cover.
Medium-plush, gel-infused memory foam hugs curves to relieve pressure, with ventilated design for better airflow and temperature.
Foam is CertiPUR-US certified for safety.
Conveniently boxed and shipped for easy set up; 10-Year Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,100 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 10-year limited warranty guarantees that your lucid mattress will be replaced, repaired or refunded at our discretion if it is deemed defective due to faulty workmanship or structural defects. The warranty does not cover normal changes in softness or resilience that do not affect the performance of the mattress. Small body impressions less than 1. 5 inches are normal and not covered under the warranty. The warranty applies only to the original purchaser. Abuse, stains on the cover or mattress, or platform or box foundation support will void any warranty. Lucid shall not be liable for any consequential losses arising from the purchase, installation and/or use of this product. For complete warranty information go to lucidmattress. Com read before opening: carefully remove plastic packaging being careful not to cut through to the mattress. Place compressed mattress on a flat surface in a well-ventilated room and allow 48 hours for expansion. Due to the unique properties of memory foam, dimensions after expansion will vary; this is normal and will not affect the performance of your new mattress. New memory foam may initially have a slight odor; it is completely harmless and will dissipate over a short time with regular use.
